title: HKU Msc FinTech 強勢 Master 登場~! 香港 = Fintech 大城市

replies.msg:
Financial Technology 係一科 multidisciplinary 學科，主要在金融行業上應用突破性技術。而 The HKU Master of Science in Financial Technology and Data Analytics [MSc(FTDA)] 正正就係為咗呢個目的而精心設計。而且係由 CS department 主辦，絕非唔湯唔水既 Business analytics 之流。此 Master 為 2 年 part time。

附上 Curriculum 既 link https://mscftda.cs.hku.hk/Curriculum/Structure

List-A Disciplinary compulsory courses 必修科目，由 Technology, Finance 及 Law 都有，唔會偏重過份一邊。CS 人可以了解到 Finance / Law 而 Finance 人都可以了解到 Block Chain 同 Cryptocurrency 呢啲最潮流 Technology !

FITE7409 # Blockchain and Cryptocurrency (6 credits) or COMP7408 # Distributed Ledger and Blockchain Technology (6 credits)
MFIN7002 Investment Analysis and Portfolio Management (6 credits)
LLAW6093 Regulation of Financial Markets (9 credits)

Candidates shall select courses in accordance with the regulations of the degree. Candidates must complete a Project and 10 courses with the following requirements.

a. Candidates must complete 3 courses in List-B Disciplinary courses with a total of 18 credits, which must include at least 6 credits from List-B-1 and at least 6 credits from List-B-2.
b. Candidates must complete 4 courses in List-C Disciplinary courses with a total of at least 24 credits, which must include at least 6 credits from List-C-1 and at least 6 credits from List-C-2.

然後 disciplinary 就細分 list B 同 list C，帶大家睇下有咩 course 啦~
以下可見 List B 絕對不 hea，課程設計非常針對 quantitative finance 及 virtual banking 所需技術
List-B-1
COMP7802 Introduction to Financial computing (6 credits)
COMP7906 Introduction to Cyber Security (6 credits)
ECOM6016 Electronic Payment Systems (6 credits)
List-B-2
FITE7407 Securities Transaction Banking (6 credits)
FITE7410 Financial Fraud Analytics (6 credits)
STAT6013 Financial Data Analysis (6 credits)

List C 就比較多元化少少，包含咗真正 computer science 既 course 及少量 Law & regulations
對比所謂 Business Analytics / Computer Science ，呢個 programme 真係比較針對到 FinTech 而學習

List-C-1
FITE7405 Techniques in Computational Finance (6 credits)
FITE7406 Software Development for Quantitative Finance (6 credits)
FITE7801 Topics in Financial Technology (6 credits)
COMP7103 Data Mining (6 credits)
COMP7305 Cluster and Cloud Computing (6 credits)
COMP7404 Computational Intelligence and Machine Learning (6 credits)
DASC7606 Deep Learning (6 credits)
STAT8020 Quantitative Strategies and Algorithmic Trading (6 credits)
List-C-2

ECOM6023 E-financial Services (6 credits)
IELM7018 Financial Engineering(6 credits)
LLAW6046 Privacy and Data Protection(9 credits)
LLAW6126 E-Finance: Law, Compliance and Technology Challenges (9 credits)
LLAW6256 Law of Anti-money Laundering and Counter-terrorist Financing and Compliance Issues (9 credits)
MFIN7034 ^ Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence in Finance (6 credits) or MFIN7037 ^ Quantitative Trading (6 credits)
STAT6015 Advanced Quantitative Risk Management and Finance (6 credits)

最後有個 12 cre 既 capstone project 比你整下嘢或者寫下嘢，為你既 CV 增添色彩!
Capstone requirement
FITE7001 Project (12 credits)

Course description 請稍移玉步: https://mscftda.cs.hku.hk/Curriculum/Description


Admission Requirement 並不要求學生有 CS degree，LinkedIn 見到有啲 case 係 E&F 都入到
學費總計 HKD 250,000 ，扣除 TPG subsidy 同半工讀其實幾抵屌

希望大家考慮下呢個 program too

港大 Mecon 獨有 4 個 stream！可能係全世界最精心設計嘅 programme

[HKU Bachelor of Information Management 簡介]
係依家 big data 資訊年代，hku bsc(im) 算係未比人發現嘅平民神科
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/2375445
有 HKMA + InvestHK 雙重政府 back up ，讀完做 IT 不是夢，就算移民都計你專業人士，移唔到民香港都搵到啖飯食，達成 Win-Win 局面。加入 FinTech 熱潮只缺你!
HKU Computer Science ranking 都好高下 (#38), 絕無水份既 master 今次 HKU 都算有返啲良心
